overview: Prepare for a hilarious ride when two buddies try to become Big Time Hustlers. To get started, they borrow fifty thousand "stacks" from 'Real Deal', a loan shark and boxing promoter.  But when the boys get ripped off on their drug buy and they have no way to repay their debt, 'Real Deal' makes them an offer they can't afford to refuse. To get out of debt, one of them must survive three rounds of boxing with 'Damaging Dynamite' but if he loses, they'll have to pay double. Come ride on this outrageous journey with two guys who just want to improve their lives but just can't get it right!
title: 50 Stacks
